metadata.title: CVE-2021-26272 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: It was possible to execute a ReDoS-type attack inside CKEditor 4 before 4.16 by persuading a victim to paste crafted URL-like text into the editor, and then press Enter or Space (in the Autolink plugin).

criterions.comment: ckeditor package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
